comments.body: this one doesn't need to receive MesosCloud either

actually *MesosCloud needs to be the receiver to implement
cloudprovider.Instances

On Thu, May 14, 2015 at 5:10 AM, David Oppenheimer <notifications@github.com

> wrote:
> 
> In pkg/cloudprovider/mesos/mesos.go
> https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pull/8053#discussion_r30307344
> :
> 
> > -   ipaddr := net.ParseIP(name)
> > -   if ipaddr != nil {
> > -       return ipaddr, nil
> > -   }
> > -   iplist, err := net.LookupIP(name)
> > -   if err != nil {
> > -       log.V(2).Infof("failed to resolve IP from host name '%v': %v", name, err)
> > -       return nil, err
> > -   }
> > -   ipaddr = iplist[0]
> > -   log.V(2).Infof("resolved host '%v' to '%v'", name, ipaddr)
> > -   return ipaddr, nil
> >   +}
> >   +
> >   +// ExternalID returns the cloud provider ID of the specified instance.
> >   +func (c *MesosCloud) ExternalID(instance string) (string, error) {
> 
> this one doesn't need to receive MesosCloud either
> 
> —

> https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pull/8053/files#r30307344
